oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of group dancing at Highlander Folk Center
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of a group holding hands and dancing at the Highlander Folk School Community Center. Participants are probably unwinding after a day of workshops and classes or participating in a community-building activity. The verso of the photograph is stamped "Keep Our Schools Segregated."

Ed Friend was the photographer sent by the Georgia Commission on Education to investigate and document the goings on at Highlander Folk School. The commission and majority of Southern state governments opposed the school's teaching, organizing, and practice of integration.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Friend, Ed, 1912-1991
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Civil rights; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Civil rights workers
